def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for a,b,c in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_abc_close = all_close([a,b,c], ctx)
        check_a_large = is_large(a, ctx)
        check_a_light = is_light(a, ctx)
        check_b_small = is_small(b, ctx)
        check_b_dark = is_dark(b, ctx)
        check_c_smaller_b = are_smaller([c], [b], ctx)
        check_c_below_b = are_below([c], [b], ctx)
        check_c_below_left = are_below_left([c], None, ctx)
        if (
            check_abc_close
            and check_a_large
            and check_a_light
            and check_b_small
            and check_b_dark
            and check_c_smaller_b
            and check_c_below_b
            and check_c_below_left
        ):
            results.append([a,b,c])
    return results
